name: SightLines
description:
SightLines

SightLines is a top-down shooter with a tactical shooter style. Currently there is a singleplayer mode. Multiplayer is the next step of our game.

How to Play: WASD to move around. Move your mouse to aim. Left-Click to shoot, Right-Click to change reticle size. Click F next to a door way to build (and re-build) a door. Wooden walls can be destroyed after being shot multiple times. Switch weapons using 1,2,3; 1.Rifle, 2.Pistol, 3.Rocket Launcher. Esc to open menu.

Currently there is a firing range which contains 2 levels to choose from.

Send all Questions, Comments, and Concerns to SigtlinesGame@gmail.com

Games is built for Windows. Made with Unity.
